channel.title: pages on Fredrik K. Gustafsson | PhD Student in Uncertainty-Aware Deep Learning
channel.description: Recent content in pages on Fredrik K. Gustafsson | PhD Student in Uncertainty-Aware Deep Learning

item.title: News
item.description: [Oct 1, 2019] Accepted workshop paper: Evaluating Scalable Bayesian Deep Learning Methods for Robust Computer Vision has been accepted to the workshop on Bayesian Deep Learning at NeurIPS 2019. [Sep 27, 2019] New preprint: DCTD: Deep Conditional Target Densities for Accurate Regression [arXiv] [project]. [Jun 5, 2019] New preprint: Evaluating Scalable Bayesian Deep Learning Methods for Robust Computer Vision [arXiv] [code] [video] [project]. [May 18, 2019] I will present our extended abstract on ensembling as approximate Bayesian inference at SSDL19, June 10 [slides].
